attributes.action: District Councils must adopt infrastructure on all new housing developments.
attributes.additional_details: The government should insist that all roads, public areas, signage, lighting and play parks etc on new build developments throughout England are adopted by local district councils rather than managed by independent companies or charities.
attributes.background: The government should insist that all roads, public areas, signage, lighting and play parks etc on new build developments throughout England are adopted by local district councils rather than managed by independent companies or charities.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about management of local infrastructure are a matter for individual developers and local authorities, not the UK Government or Parliament.
